blogPost.excerpt:
Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak, Silk Sonic - Leave The Door Open - Live from the iHeartRadio Music Awards 2021

"Leave The Door Open" out now! https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/LTDOID

🔔 Subscribe for the latest official music videos, live performances, lyric videos, official audio, and more: https://Atlantic.lnk.to/BMsubscribe

🎵 Listen to the Best of Bruno Mars playlist ➤ https://bit.ly/3bbslw8​
🎵 Watch Bruno Mars’ Official Music Videos ➤ https://bit.ly/2U7I3mi​

Connect with Bruno: 
http://www.brunomars.com​ 
http://www.instagram.com/brunomars​ 
http://www.twitter.com/brunomars​ 
http://www.facebook.com/brunomars 

Connect with Anderson .Paak: 
https://www.facebook.com/AndersonPaak 
https://www.instagram.com/anderson._paak/ 
https://twitter.com/AndersonPaak 

Connect with Silk Sonic: 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Instagram 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Twitter 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Facebook 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Spotify 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/AppleMusic 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/TikTok 

Lyrics: 
Say baby, say baby, say baby

What you doin 

(what you doin)


Where you at

(where you at)


Oh you got plans  

(you got plans)


Don’t say that       

(shut yo trap)


I’m sippin wine     

(sip sip)


In a robe               

(drip drip)


I look too good    

(look too good)


To be alone         

(wooohooo)


My house clean  

(house clean)

 
My pool warm   

(pool warm)

 
Just shaved        

(smooth like a new born)

 
We should be dancing, romancing

In the east wing and the west wing

Of this mansion, what’s happenin

 

I aint playin no games

Every word that I say 

Is coming straight from the heart

(so if you tryna lay in these arms)

 

Imma leave the door open

(imma leave the door open)

Imma leave the door open girl

(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

 
That you feel the way I feel

And you want me like I want you tonight baby

(tell me that you’re coming through) 


 
You’re so sweet 

(so sweet)

 
So tight

(so tight)

 
I won’t bite

(ahh ahh)

 
Unless you like

(unless you like)

 
If you smoke

(what you smoke)

 

I got that haze

(purple haze)

 
And if you’re hungry girl I got filets

(woohooo)

 
Ooh baby don’t keep me 

(waiting)

There’s so much love we could be making

(Shamone)

I’m talking kissing, Cuddling

Rose petals in the bathtub

Girl lets jump in, It’s bubblin


I aint playin no games

Every word that I say 

Is coming straight from the heart

So if you tryna lay in these arms

( if you tryna lay in these arms)



Imma leave the door open

(imma leave the door open)

Imma leave the door open girl

(Imma leave the door open, hopin)


That you feel the way I feel

And you want me like I want you tonight baby

(tell me that you’re coming through)

 
La la laaa la la la laaa 

(I need you baby)

 
La la laaa la la la laaa

(I gotta see you baby)


La la laaa la la la laaa 

(Girl I’m tryna give you this)

(aaaaahhhhhhhhhh)


Imma leave my door open, baby

(imma leave the door open)

Imma leave, imma leave my door open girl

(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

And I’m hopin



Hopin that you feel the way I feel

And you want me like I want you tonight baby

(tell me that you’re coming through)

 

La la laaa la la la laaa

Tell me

(Tell me that you’re coming through)

 

Woo, woo-woo, woo, woo-woo,woo

Woo-woo

Woo, woo-woo, woo, woo-woo,woo

Woo-woo

 

La la laaa la la la laaa

(Tell me that you’re coming through)

 

Girl, I’m here just waiting for you

Come on over, I’ll adore you

(I gotta know)

(La la laaa la la la laaa)

I’m waiting, waiting, waiting for you

 

(Tell me that you’re coming through)

Girl, I’m here just waiting for you

Come on over, I’ll adore you



The official YouTube channel of Atlantic Records artist Bruno Mars. 11x GRAMMY Award winner and 27x GRAMMY Award nominee Bruno Mars is a celebrated singer, songwriter, producer, and musician with iconic hits like "The Lazy Song", "That's What I Like", "Just The Way You Are", "24K Magic", "Locked Out Of Heaven", and "When I Was Your Man". His legendary body of work also includes blockbuster albums such as Doo-Wops & Hooligans, Unorthodox Jukebox, and 24K Magic, as well as era-defining collaborations like "Uptown Funk" with Mark Ronson, "Finesse" with Cardi B, and "Nothin' On You" with B.o.B. Forever classic, yet supremely innovative, Bruno continues to redefine music, style, and popular culture, pushing the boundaries of pop, R&B, funk, soul, hip-hop, and dance, and remains as influential as ever.
 
#BrunoMars #LeaveTheDoorOpen #SilkSonic #AndersonPaak #iheartradio

(waiting)

(Shamone)

I’m talking kissing, Cuddling

Rose petals in the bathtub

Girl lets jump in, It’s bubblin


I aint playin no games

Every word that I say 

Is coming straight from the heart

So if you tryna lay in these arms

( if you tryna lay in these arms)



Imma leave the door open

(imma leave the door open)

Imma leave the door open girl

(Imma leave the door open, hopin)


That you feel the way I feel

And you want me like I want you tonight baby

(tell me that you’re coming through)

 
La la laaa la la la laaa 

(I need you baby)

 
La la laaa la la la laaa

(I gotta see you baby)


La la laaa la la la laaa 

(Girl I’m tryna give you this)

(aaaaahhhhhhhhhh)


Imma leave my door open, baby

(imma leave the door open)

(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

And I’m hopin



Hopin that you feel the way I feel

And you want me like I want you tonight baby

(tell me that you’re coming through)

 

La la laaa la la la laaa

Tell me

(Tell me that you’re coming through)

 

Woo, woo-woo, woo, woo-woo,woo

Woo-woo

Woo-woo

 

La la laaa la la la laaa

(Tell me that you’re coming through)

 

Girl, I’m here just waiting for you

Come on over, I’ll adore you

Come on over, I’ll adore you



The official YouTube channel of Atlantic Records artist Bruno Mars. 11x GRAMMY Award winner and 27x GRAMMY Award nominee Bruno Mars is a celebrated singer, songwriter, producer, and musician with iconic hits like "The Lazy Song", "That's What I Like", "Just The Way You Are", "24K Magic", "Locked Out Of Heaven", and "When I Was Your Man". His legendary body of work also includes blockbuster albums such as Doo-Wops & Hooligans, Unorthodox Jukebox, and 24K Magic, as well as era-defining collaborations like "Uptown Funk" with Mark Ronson, "Finesse" with Cardi B, and "Nothin' On You" with B.o.B. Forever classic, yet supremely innovative, Bruno continues to redefine music, style, and popular culture, pushing the boundaries of pop, R&B, funk, soul, hip-hop, and dance, and remains as influential as ever.
 
#BrunoMars #LeaveTheDoorOpen #SilkSonic #AndersonPaak #iheartradio

localize.title: Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak, Silk Sonic- Leave The Door Open (Live from iHeartRadio Music Awards)
localize.description:
Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak, Silk Sonic - Leave The Door Open - Live from the iHeartRadio Music Awards 2021

"Leave The Door Open" 発売中！ https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/LTDOID

🔔 最新のオフィシャル・ミュージック・ビデオ、ライブ・パフォーマンス、リリック・ビデオ、オフィシャル・オーディオなどの情報を登録してください: https://Atlantic.lnk.to/BMsubscribe

🎵 ベスト・オブ・ブルーノ・マーズのプレイリストを聴く ➤ https://bit.ly/3bbslw8
🎵 ブルーノ・マーズのオフィシャル・ミュージック・ビデオを見る ➤ https://bit.ly/2U7I3mi

ブルーノとつながる 
http://www.brunomars.com 
http://www.instagram.com/brunomars 
http://www.twitter.com/brunomars 
http://www.facebook.com/brunomars 

Anderson .Paakとつながる。
https://www.facebook.com/AndersonPaak 
https://www.instagram.com/anderson._paak/ 
https://twitter.com/AndersonPaak 

Connect with Silk Sonic: 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Instagram 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Twitter 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Facebook 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Spotify 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/AppleMusic 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/TikTok 

歌詞を紹介します。
セイ・ベイビー、セイ・ベイビー、セイ・ベイビー

あなたは何をしているの？

(What you doin)


あなたはどこにいるの？

(where you at)


♪Oh you got plans  

(you got plans)


Don't say that       

(シャット・ヨー・トラップ)


I'm sippin wine     

(sip sip)


In a robe               

(drip drip)


I look too good (ルック・トゥー・グッド)    

(look too good)


To be alone（ひとりぼっち         

(woooooo)


♪ My house clean  

(house clean)

 
My pool warm   

(プールは暖かい)

 
Just shaved        

(Smooth like a new born)

 
私たちは踊るべきだ、ロマンスするべきだ

東の棟と西の棟で

Of this mansion, what's happenin

 

私はゲームをしません

私の言葉はすべて 

心からのストレートな言葉で

もし君がこの腕の中で寝ようとしたら

 

ドアは開けたままにしておこう

(イマ・リーブ・ザ・ドア・オープン)

♪Immma leave the door open girl

(Immma leave the door open, hopin)

 
私が感じているようにあなたも感じているはず

そして君は僕が今夜欲しいように僕を欲しがるんだ ベイビー

(Tell me that you're coming through) 


 
You're so sweet 

(so sweet)

 
So tight

(so tight)

 
I won't bite（噛まないよ

(ahh ahh)

 
Unless you like

(not you like)

 
If you smoke (あなたが吸うもの)

(What you smoke)

 

(I got that haze)

(パープルヘイズ)

 
And if you're hungry girl I got filets

(woohooo)

 
Ooh Baby Don't keep me 

(待つ)

私たちが作れる愛はたくさんあるのに

(Shamone)

I'm talking kissing, Cuddling

バスタブにバラの花びら

ガールズ・レッツ・ジャンプ・イン、イッツ・バブルリン


I aint playin no game

私が言うすべての言葉は 

心からのストレートな言葉で

So if you tryna lay in this arm

( if you tryna lay in these arms )



イマはドアを開けたまま

(イマ・リーブ・ザ・ドア・オープン)

イマ・リーブ・ザ・ドア・オープン・ガール

(Immma leave the door open, hopin)


私が感じているようにあなたも感じているはず

そして君は僕が今夜欲しいように僕を欲しがるんだ ベイビー

(Tell me that you're coming through)

 
La la laaa la la la laaa 

(I need you baby)

 
La la laaa la la la laaa

(I gotta see you baby)


La la laaa la la la laaa 

(Girl I'm tryna give you this)

(あああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああ)


(Imma leave my door open, baby)

(イマ・リーブ・ザ・ドア・オープン)

(Immma leave, imma leave my door open girl)

(Immma leave the door open, hopin)

And I'm hopin



あなたが私と同じように感じてくれることを

そしてあなたは私が今夜あなたに望むように私を望んでいる

(Tell me that you're coming through)

 

La la laaa la la la laaa

Tell me

(Tell me that you're coming through)

 

Woo, woo-woo, woo, woo-woo,woo

Woo-woo

Woo, woo-woo, woo, woo-woo,woo

Woo-woo

 

ララララララララララララ

(Tell me that you're coming through)

 

Girl, I'm here just waiting for you (ガール、私はここで君を待っているよ)

Come on over, I'll adore you

(I gotta know)

(La la laaa la la la)

I'm waiting, waiting, waiting for you

 

(Tell me that you're coming through)

Girl, I'm here just waiting for you (ガール、僕はここで君を待っているよ)

こっちに来て、私はあなたを崇拝するよ



アトランティック・レコード所属のアーティスト、ブルーノ・マーズの公式YouTubeチャンネルです。グラミー賞11回受賞、グラミー賞27回ノミネートのブルーノ・マーズは、シンガー、ソングライター、プロデューサー、ミュージシャンとして有名で、「The Lazy Song」、「That's What I Like」、「Just The Way You Are」、「24K Magic」、「Locked Out Of Heaven」、「When I Was Your Man」などの象徴的なヒット曲を生み出しています。また、「Doo-Wops & Hooligans」、「Unorthodox Jukebox」、「24K Magic」などの大ヒットアルバムや、マーク・ロンソンとの「Uptown Funk」、カーディ・Bとの「Finesse」、B.O.Bとの「Nothin' On You」など、時代を象徴するようなコラボレーションも伝説的な作品となっています。 永遠のクラシックでありながら最高に革新的なブルーノは、音楽、スタイル、ポピュラーカルチャーを再定義し、ポップ、R&B、ファンク、ソウル、ヒップホップ、ダンスの境界を押し広げ、これまでと同様に影響力を持ち続けています。
 
#BrunoMars #LeaveTheDoorOpen #SilkSonic #AndersonPaak #iheartradio

localize.title: Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak, Silk Sonic- Leave The Door Open (iHeartRadio Music Awards现场)
localize.description:
Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak, Silk Sonic - Leave The Door Open - Live from the iHeartRadio Music Awards 2021

"Leave The Door Open "现已发布！https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/LTDOID

🔔 订阅最新的官方音乐视频、现场表演、抒情视频、官方音频等：https://Atlantic.lnk.to/BMsubscribe

🎵 收听布鲁诺-马斯的最佳播放列表 ➤ https://bit.ly/3bbslw8
🎵 观看布鲁诺-马斯的官方音乐视频 ➤ https://bit.ly/2U7I3mi

与布鲁诺联系。
http://www.brunomars.com 
http://www.instagram.com/brunomars 
http://www.twitter.com/brunomars 
http://www.facebook.com/brunomars 

与Anderson .Paak联系。
https://www.facebook.com/AndersonPaak 
https://www.instagram.com/anderson._paak/ 
https://twitter.com/AndersonPaak 

与Silk Sonic联系。
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Instagram 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Twitter 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Facebook 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Spotify 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/AppleMusic 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/TikTok 

歌词。
说宝贝，说宝贝，说宝贝

What you doin 

(你在做什么)


你在哪里

（你在哪里）


哦，你有计划  

(你有计划)


Don't say that (Don't say that)       

（闭上你的嘴）


I'm sippin wine (我在喝葡萄酒)     

（啜饮啜饮）


In a robe               

(drip drip)


I look too good    

(look too good)


To be alone (独自一人)         

(wooohooo)


我的房子很干净  

(房子干净)

 
我的游泳池温暖   

(泳池温暖)

 
刚刮完胡子        

(像新生儿一样光滑)

 
我们应该跳舞，浪漫

在东翼和西翼

这座豪宅里，发生了什么？

 

我不玩任何游戏

我说的每一个字 

都是发自内心的

(所以如果你想躺在这些怀抱里)

 

我要把门打开

(我让门开着)

(Imma leave the door open girl)

（我把门打开，希望）

 
That you feel the way I feel

And you want me like I want you tonight baby 你想要我，就像我想要你一样

(告诉我你会来的) 


 
You're so sweet 

（如此甜蜜）

 
那么紧

(这么紧)

 
I won't bite

(ahh ahh)

 
除非你喜欢

(除非你喜欢)

 
If you smoke (如果你抽烟)

(你抽什么烟)

 

我得到了那个阴霾

(紫色的阴霾)

 
如果你是饥饿的女孩，我有鱼排

(woohooo)

 
Ooh baby don't keep me 

（等待）

有这么多的爱，我们可以使

(Shamone)

我在说接吻，拥抱

浴缸里的玫瑰花瓣

女孩让我们跳进去，它正在冒泡


我不是在玩什么游戏

我说的每一个字 

都是发自内心的

所以，如果你想躺在这怀抱里

（如果你想躺在这些怀抱中）



我就把门打开

(Immma leave the door open)

我想把门打开的女孩

(Imma leave the door open, hopin)


That you feel the way I feel

And you want me like I want you tonight baby 你想要我，就像我想要你一样

(告诉我你会来的)

 
La la laaa la la la laaa 

（我需要你宝贝）

 
啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦

I gotta see you baby


啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦 

(Girl I'm tryna give you this)

(aaaaahhhhhhhh)


Imma leave my door open, baby

(imma leave the door open)

我离开，我离开我的门打开的女孩

(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

And I'm hopin



希望你有我的感觉

你想要我，就像我今晚想要你一样宝贝

(告诉我你会来的)

 

La la laaa la la la laaa

告诉我

(告诉我，你要来了)

 

Woo, woo -woo, woo, woo -woo,woo

Woo-woo（呜呜）。

Woo, woo-woo, woo, woo-woo,wu

Woo-woo

 

La la laaa la la la laaa

（告诉我你要来了）

 

女孩，我在这里只是在等你

来吧，我会爱慕你的

(I gotta know)

(啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦)

I'm waiting, waiting, waiting for you (我在等待，等待，等待你)

 

(告诉我，你要来了)

Girl, I'm here just waiting for you (女孩，我在这里等你)

过来吧，我会爱慕你的



大西洋唱片公司艺术家布鲁诺-马斯的官方YouTube频道。11次格莱美奖得主和27次格莱美奖提名者布鲁诺-马斯是一位著名的歌手、作曲家、制作人和音乐家，他的标志性作品包括《懒惰之歌》、《这就是我喜欢的》、《Just The Way You Are》、《24K Magic》、《Locked Out Of Heaven》和《When I Was Your Man》。他的传奇性作品还包括诸如《Doo-Wops & Hooligans》、《Unorthodox Jukebox》和《24K Magic》等大片，以及与Mark Ronson合作的《Uptown Funk》、与Cardi B合作的《Finesse》和与B. 布鲁诺永远是经典，但又极富创新精神，他继续重新定义音乐、风格和流行文化，推动了流行、R&B、放克、灵魂、嘻哈和舞蹈的界限，并一如既往地保持着影响力。
 
#BrunoMars #LeaveTheDoorOpen #SilkSonic #AndersonPaak #iheartradio

大西洋唱片公司藝術家布魯諾-馬斯的官方YouTube頻道。11次格萊美獎得主和27次格萊美獎提名者布魯諾-馬斯是一位著名的歌手、作曲家、製作人和音樂家，他的標誌性作品包括《懶惰之歌》、《這就是我喜歡的》、《Just The Way You Are》、《24K Magic》、《Locked Out Of Heaven》和《When I Was Your Man》。他的傳奇性作品還包括諸如《Doo-Wops & Hooligans》、《Unorthodox Jukebox》和《24K Magic》等大片，以及與Mark Ronson合作的《Uptown Funk》、與Cardi B合作的《Finesse》和與B. 布魯諾永遠是經典，但又極富創新精神，他繼續重新定義音樂、風格和流行文化，推動了流行、R&B、放克、靈魂、嘻哈和舞蹈的界限，並一如既往地保持着影響力。
 
#BrunoMars #LeaveTheDoorOpen #SilkSonic #AndersonPaak #iheartradio
